column2: "Yo, Partner... My sister, Yucreta, is over there."
"She's more or less coming to terms that I'm her younger brother, though she doesn't talk much."
"Though, it's better than before. She would run when I would appear."
"New clothes? Oh, both Yucreta and I had worn-out, damaged clothes from last time, so I got us new uniforms."
"So, how about you? Umm, with Matoi's..."
"I see... Don't give up just yet, Partner. I'll help with any way I possibly can."
"What an irresponsible way of talking... Are you implying that you shouldn't give up against the [Profound Darkness]?"
"Yuc-ane? Were you listening in?"
"Don't get me wrong... I'm just doing this so you'll leave me alone."
"So you're wondering if there's a way to undo what has happened to that girl, Matoi? Well unfortunately, I don't know."
"I'm likely the exception, I was half a Dark Falz. Normally it'd would be nearly impossible to undo that."
"No use on trying with pulling that on the [Profound Darkness]."
"Don't say that! Partner, don't give up on her..."
"If you really cared for her, don't you think the best way of saving her is to ease her suffering?"
"But you, you have that same \"not giving up\" attitude as Afin does."
"I'm telling you that I was the exception, I was half-transformed."
"But if the same can be said for that girl, Matoi, then you might have a shot at it."
"I don't know how to undo it, so you're on your own there."
"Though, if I had to guess, you'll be copying what happened with me and call out her name."
"You'll find that to be surprisingly effective. Photons do convert emotions into power."
"Yuc-ane..."
"If that's all. Then you should be leaving."
"It would be troublesome to have two people loitering near me."
"You can now call Afin from the Support Partner Terminal."
